caption: This photograph depicts a calm body of water reflecting a slightly industrialized backdrop. The image features a noticeable oil slick that creates a rainbow sheen on the surface of the water. The reflection in the water shows buildings and structures in a muted manner, hinting at warehouse or storage facilities near a dock. The sky is overcast, creating a subdued lighting that enhances the subtle colors of the oil slick. There is no visible movement in the water, suggesting a serene but somewhat polluted environment.
title: Bethlehem steel plant at sparrows point
